title: Pokemon The Movie XYandZ: Volcanion and the Mechanical Magearna
description:
-PokÃ©mon The Movie XY&Z - Volcanion and Mechanical Magearna [Offscreen Recording]-
		///Unofficial Re-Distribution by Time-Light///

			///About the Movie///
Satoshi (Ash) and his friends continuing their adventure across the Kalos Region,
they come across a place called the Azoth Kingdom, a town powered with technology,
just as while Satoshi (Ash) and Citron (Clemont) are battling each other, Volcanion
falls down and disrupts their battle. It is then that Satoshi (Ash) and Volcanion have
an odd device around themselves, which pulls Satoshi (Ash) towards Volcanion's leg using
an electro-magnetic field. Along the way, Satoshi (Ash), his friends and Volcanion come
across the Artifical PokÃ©mon, Magearna, which is powered by the Soul-Heart. The Minister
wants to obtain the Soul-Heart to use for himself. Will the heroes manage to save the
Azoth Kingdom disaster falls?
